books.title: Odyssey of Stars I
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: A rookie pilot charts a perilous course through a collapsing nebula.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars II
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: An ancient beacon awakens, broadcasting a map to a forgotten galaxy.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars III
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: A science vessel uncovers life in the rings of a rogue planet.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars IV
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: Smugglers and scholars race to decode a starborn language.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars V
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: Time fractures aboard a deep-space relay near a black hole.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars VI
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: A diplomat must negotiate with an AI-run civilization of suns.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars VII
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: A derelict ark drifts back into known space with a warning.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars VIII
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: Terraformers vanish on the eve of igniting a newborn world.

books.title: Odyssey of Stars IX
books.author: A. Nova
books.desc: The crew confronts the architect behind a cosmic labyrinth.
